credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 11 x 21 cm (4 5/16 x 8 1/4 in.)
title: Fragment
description: Subtle horizontal stripe effect in white on white created by use of heavier hand-spun yarns in the weft which vary in thickness along their length. The warp is of thin, crepe-textured yarns.
name: Fragment
